title: Luncheon for adults 50-plus
content: A “Patriotic Luncheon” for ages 50+ will be held noon to 2 p.m. Tuesday, June 26 at the Chino Hills Community Center, 14250 Peyton Drive.     Tickets are $5. The event is hosted by the City of Chino Hills active adults 50+ program.       Subscription Required   An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety.
